headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Visit Ammu-Nation to pick up a pair of Night Vision Goggles or try on the Night Vision Masks available at Vespucci Movie Masks, both free.

Both High-End Apartments and their Renovations and Modifications are 40% off. Body Armor is 50% off and Weapons are 30% off. Plus, there are a range of discounted vehicles and aircraft, including:

- Mammoth Hydra – 40% off
- Buckingham Valkyrie – 40% off
- Savage – 40% off
- HVY Insurgent – 40% off

And More! Visit the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
